amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Corps of Engineers investigations by $30 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Investigations including recession of funds by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 341 (Roll no. 502).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
